desc: Aiva distributes grocery products including American, Hispanic, and Asian spices, pulses, sauces, coffee & Tea, & USDA approved organic food products. Our mission is to provide quality products, simpler supply chain, and one stop shopping for Wholesalers, Retail stores, and Restaurants.

layout.text: Aiva is a full service grocery, health & beauty, and supplements company for your source of natural and high quality products
